maker: Attributed to André-Charles Boulle, and medallions after Jean Varin
title: Cabinet on Stand
description: Cabinet on Stand; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666), and medallions after Jean Varin (French, 1596 - 1672); Paris, France; about 1675 - 1680; Oak veneered with pewter, brass, tortoise shell, horn, ebony, ivory, and wood marquetry; bronze mounts; figures of painted and gilded oak; drawers of snakewood; 229.9 × 151.2 × 66.7 cm (90 1/2 × 59 1/2 × 26 1/4 in.); 77.DA.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
